mods.abstract: Four color window card (blue, red, purple, and yellow on white) announcing American Letterpress: The Art of Hatch Show Print coming soon ten big show. The exhibit is presented by the Smithsonian Traveling Exhibition Service, Hatch Show Print, and the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Poster features a woodcut of a circus scene.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
